task.summary: removed boilerplate that comes with gradle init, added some Fruit types, and some kind of shop checkout
Inject a price list and loop through the contents of the basket for a price
make all prices use Price type alias
Add mockito, going to move pricing logic out of cart so will need to mock it
refactor in preparation for special offers
Apples BOGOF, Oranges three for two
Move pricing logic into strategy function
moved stuff around a lot, simplified
